item.title: First 6 weeks in the Recurse Center
item.description: For the past 6 weeks, I have been attending the Recurse Center (RC). The Recurse Center is: an educational retreat for programmers who want to become dramatically better with a community of peers doing the same. The journey has been fascinating. Hence, I want to share my experience and challenges in RC so far and plan for my remaining 6 weeks in RC.
